verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> <S%H681>hard<s%> by the <S%H1964>palace<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> that I may <S%H1961>have<s%> it for a <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H3419>herbs,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is near <S%H7138>unto<s%> <S%H681><s%> my <S%H1004>house:<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee <S%H8478>for<s%> it a <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> it; or, <S%H518>if<s%> it seem good to <S%H2895>thee,<s%> <S%H5869><s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H4242>worth<s%> of <S%H2088>it<s%> in <S%H3701>money.<s%>

And <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> The <S%H4480>LORD<s%> <S%H3068><s%> <S%H2486>forbid<s%> it me, that I should <S%H4480>give<s%> <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%> unto thee.

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5620>heavy<s%> and <S%H2198>displeased<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him: for he had <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers.<s%> And he laid him <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and turned <S%H5437>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and would <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

But <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him, and <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H2088><s%> is thy <S%H7307>spirit<s%> so <S%H5620>sad,<s%> that thou <S%H398>eatest<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread?<s%>

And he <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> for <S%H3701>money;<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> else, <S%H518>if<s%> it <S%H2654>please<s%> <S%H859>thee,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee another <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> it: and he <S%H559>answered,<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> my <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

And <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Dost <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H6213>govern<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and let thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H3190>merry:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite.<s%>

So she <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> in <S%H256>Ahab's<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> them with his <S%H2368>seal,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H5612>letters<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in his <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth.<s%>

And she <S%H3789>wrote<s%> in the <S%H5612>letters,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7121>Proclaim<s%> a <S%H6685>fast,<s%> and <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> on <S%H7218>high<s%> among the people: <S%H5971><s%>

And <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial,<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> him, to bear witness <S%H5749>against<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thou didst <S%H1288>blaspheme<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and the <S%H4428>king.<s%> And then carry him <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H5619>stone<s%> him, that he may <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> even the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> in his <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, and <S%H834>as<s%> it was <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>letters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she had <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them.
They <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> a <S%H6685>fast,<s%> and <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> on <S%H7218>high<s%> among the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And there came <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> him: and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial<s%> witnessed <S%H5749>against<s%> him, even <S%H853>against<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth,<s%> in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> did <S%H1288>blaspheme<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and the <S%H4428>king.<s%> Then they carried him <S%H3318>forth<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5619>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones,<s%> that he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
Then they <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> is <S%H5619>stoned,<s%> and is <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> was <S%H5619>stoned,<s%> and was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> that <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> take <S%H3423>possession<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> thee for <S%H3701>money:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H2416>alive,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> that <S%H256>Ahab<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite,<s%> to take <S%H3423>possession<s%> of it.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7121>meet<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H8111>Samaria:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is in the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he is gone <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Hast thou <S%H7523>killed,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> taken <S%H3423>possession?<s%> And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> In the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H3952>licked<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> shall <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H3952>lick<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H859>thine.<s%>

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> Hast thou <S%H4672>found<s%> me, O mine <S%H341>enemy?<s%> And he <S%H559>answered,<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> thee: <S%H3282>because<s%> thou hast <S%H4376>sold<s%> thyself to <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> thee, and will take <S%H1197>away<s%> thy <S%H310>posterity,<s%> and will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H256>Ahab<s%> him that <S%H8366>pisseth<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and him that is shut <S%H6113>up<s%> and <S%H5800>left<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

And will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H1004>house<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> and like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H281>Ahijah,<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> thou hast provoked me to <S%H3707>anger,<s%> and made Israel to <S%H2398>sin.<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478><s%>

And of <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> by the <S%H2426>wall<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

Him that <S%H4191>dieth<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat;<s%> and him that <S%H4191>dieth<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%> <S%H398>eat.<s%>

But <S%H7535><s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> like unto <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> did sell <S%H4376>himself<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> stirred <S%H5496>up.<s%>

And he did <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H8581>abominably<s%> in <S%H1980>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H1544>idols,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> things <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted,<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> in <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H328>softly.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Seest <S%H7200><s%> thou <S%H3588>how<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> humbleth <S%H3665>himself<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me? <S%H3282>because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> he humbleth <S%H3665>himself<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me, I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> in his <S%H3117>days:<s%> but in his <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H1004>house.<s%>
